data.title: Some Descendants of the WASHINGTON Family Related to George Washington 1st US President
data.text:
Some Descendants of

Lawrence WASHINGTON Gent.

(1568 - 1616)

Click HERE to See how George Washington 1st US President's Family are Related to this Person.

(Persons with names shown in Green are Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President)

(Persons with names in RED are Especially Notable Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President).

Copyright 2007 by Terry J. Booth. All reproduction or reuse is prohibited, in whole or in part, without written permission of the author.

The author has relied much on those herein cited. Please contact the author about an important source not cited or improperly cited.

First Generation

Lawrence WASHINGTON Gent.,1 son of Robert WASHINGTON Esq. and Elizabeth LYTE, was born about 1568 of Sulgrave Manor, Northampton, England,1 died 13 Dec 1616 in Wicken, Northamptonshire, England 1 about age 48, and was buried in St. Michael's, Brington, Hamptonshire, England.1 Lawrence married Margaret BUTLER (See Link for Ancestry),1 daughter of William BUTLER and Margaret GREEKE, 3 Aug 1588 in St. Leonard's Church, Aston le Walls, Northamptonshire, England.1 Margaret was born circa 1570 of Aston le Walls, Northamptonshire, England,1 died 16 Mar 1651/52 of Wicken, Northamptonshire, England 1 at age 82, and was buried in East Haddon, Northamptonshire, England.1

The Child from this marriage was:

2. i. (Rev.) Lawrence WASHINGTON Rector of Little Braxted 1 2 3 was born about 1602 in Sulgrave Manor, Northampton, England,1 2 3 died about Jan 1652/53 of Little Braxted, Essex, England 2 3 about age 51, and was buried 21 Jan 1652/53 in Maldon, Essex, England.1 2 3

Second Generation

2. (Rev.) Lawrence WASHINGTON Rector of Little Braxted 1 2 3 (Lawrence Gent. 1) was born about 1602 in Sulgrave Manor, Northampton, England,1 2 3 died about Jan 1652/53 of Little Braxted, Essex, England 2 3 about age 51, and was buried 21 Jan 1652/53 in Maldon, Essex, England.1 2 3 Lawrence married Amphilis TWIGDEN 1 2 4 about 1633 in Purleigh, Essex, England.1 2 3 Amphilis was born before 2 Feb 1601/02 of Northamptonshire, England,2 4 was baptized 2 Feb 1601/02 in Spratton, Northamptonshire, England,1 2 4 died about Jan 1654/55 of Tring, Herefordshire, England,1 2 4 and was buried 12 Jan 1654/55 in Tring, Herefordshire, England.1 4

The Child from this marriage was:

3. i. John 'Immigrant' WASHINGTON 3 was born before 1635 in Purleigh, Essex, England 3 and died about Jan 1676/77 in Washington Parish, Westmoreland County VA.3

Third Generation

3. John 'Immigrant' WASHINGTON 3 (Lawrence Rector of Little Braxted ((Rev.)) 2, Lawrence Gent. 1) was born before 1635 in Purleigh, Essex, England 3 and died about Jan 1676/77 in Washington Parish, Westmoreland County VA.3 John married Ann POPE,3 daughter of (Col.) Nathaniel POPE, 1 Dec 1658 in Westmorland Co., Virginia.3 Ann was born about 1635 in England and died about 1668 in Westmorland Co., Virginia 3 about age 33.

The Child from this marriage was:

4. i. (Capt.) Lawrence WASHINGTON High Sheriff of Virginia 5 6 was born 1 Sep 1659 in Bridge's Creek, Westmoreland Co, VA and died 1 Feb 1696/97 in Warner Hall, Gloucester Co., VA at age 37.

Fourth Generation

4. (Capt.) Lawrence WASHINGTON High Sheriff of Virginia 5 6 (John 'Immigrant' 3, Lawrence Rector of Little Braxted ((Rev.)) 2, Lawrence Gent. 1) was born 1 Sep 1659 in Bridge's Creek, Westmoreland Co, VA and died 1 Feb 1696/97 in Warner Hall, Gloucester Co., VA at age 37. Lawrence married Mildred WARNER (See Link for Ancestry),5 6 daughter of (Col.) Augustine WARNER Speaker of Virginia House of Burgesses and Mildred READE, about 1690 in Virginia.5 6 Mildred was born about 1670 in Fredericksburg, Spotsylvania Co., VA, died 26 Mar 1701 in Whitehaven, Cumberland, England about age 31, and was buried in St. Nicholas Churchyard, Whitehaven, England.

The Child from this marriage was:

5. i. (Capt) Augustine WASHINGTON 5 7 was born about 1694 in Wakefield, Westmoreland Co., VA,7 died 12 Apr 1743 in Ferry Farm, King George Co., VA 7 about age 49, and was buried in Virginia.

Fifth Generation

5. (Capt) Augustine WASHINGTON 5 7 (Lawrence High Sheriff of Virginia ((Capt.)) 4, John 'Immigrant' 3, Lawrence Rector of Little Braxted ((Rev.)) 2, Lawrence Gent. 1) was born about 1694 in Wakefield, Westmoreland Co., VA,7 died 12 Apr 1743 in Ferry Farm, King George Co., VA 7 about age 49, and was buried in Virginia. Augustine married Jane BUTLER 7 circa 1715 in Prob Virginia.7 Jane was born about 1699 and died about 1729 in Prob Virginia 7 about age 30.

Children from this marriage were:

6. i. Butler WASHINGTON 7 was born about 1715 in Virginia 7 and died about 1729 7 about age 14.

7. ii. Lawrence WASHINGTON 10 was born about 1718 in Virginia 10 and died about 1752 of Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 10 about age 34. Lawrence married Anne FAIRFAX 10 circa 1744.10 Anne was born about 1728 10 and died about 1761 of Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 10 about age 33.

8. iii. Augustine WASHINGTON Jr. 11 was born about 1720 in Prob Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 11 and died about May 1762 of Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 11 about age 42. Augustine married Anne AYLETT 11 circa 1745.11 Anne was born circa 1726 in Nominy Plantation, Virginia 11 and died of Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA.

9. iv. Jane WASHINGTON 7 was born about 1722 in Virginia 7 and died about 1735 7 about age 13.

Augustine next married Mary BALL (See Link for Ancestry),5 7 9 daughter of Joseph BALL and Mary BENNETT, 6 Mar 1730/31 in Epping Forest, Lancaster Co., VA.7 8 9 Mary was born about 1709 in Lancaster Co., Virginia,9 died 25 Aug 1789 in Fredericksburg, Spotsylvania Co., VA 7 9 about age 80, and was buried in Aug 1789 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA.

Children from this marriage were:

10. i. George WASHINGTON 1st US President [1788-1796] 5 12 was born 22 Feb 1731/32 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA,12 died 14 Dec 1799 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 12 at age 67, and was buried 18 Dec 1799 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA.

11. ii. Elizabeth 'Betty' WASHINGTON 14 was born 20 Jun 1733 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 14 and died about 1797 about age 64. Elizabeth married Fielding LEWIS 14 about 1750.14 Fielding was born circa 1730.

12. iii. Samuel WASHINGTON 15 was born 16 Nov 1734 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 15 and died about 1781 of Stafford Co., Virginia 15 about age 47.

13. iv. John Augustine WASHINGTON (Ancestor of Diana, Princess of Wales) 16 was born about 1735 in Virginia 16 and died about 1787 of Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 16 about age 52. John married Hannah BUSHROD about 1756.16 Hannah was born circa 1735 and died of Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA.

14. v. Charles WASHINGTON 17 was born 2 May 1738 in Hunting Creek, Stafford Co., VA 17 and died 16 Sep 1799 in Happy Retreat, Charles Town, Jefferson Co., WV 17 at age 61. Charles married Mildred THORNTON 17 about 1761.17 Mildred was born circa 1740 and died of Happy Retreat, Charles Town, Jefferson Co., WV.

15. vi. Mildred WASHINGTON 7 was born about 1739 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 7 and died about 1740 7 about age 1.

Sixth Generation

10. George WASHINGTON 1st US President [1788-1796] 5 12 (Augustine ((Capt)) 5, Lawrence High Sheriff of Virginia ((Capt.)) 4, John 'Immigrant' 3, Lawrence Rector of Little Braxted ((Rev.)) 2, Lawrence Gent. 1) was born 22 Feb 1731/32 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA,12 died 14 Dec 1799 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 12 at age 67, and was buried 18 Dec 1799 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA. George married Martha (Custis) DANDRIDGE (See Link for Ancestry),5 12 13 daughter of (Col.) John DANDRIDGE New Kent County Clerk and Frances Orlando JONES, 6 Jan 1759 in St. Peters Church, New Kent Co., VA.5 12 13 Martha was born 2 Jun 1731 in Chestnut Grove Plantation, New Kent Co., Virginia 13 and died 22 May 1802 in Mt. Vernon, Fairfax Co., VA 13 at age 70.

The Child from this marriage was:

16. i. George and Martha had no Children .12

12. Samuel WASHINGTON 15 (Augustine ((Capt)) 5, Lawrence High Sheriff of Virginia ((Capt.)) 4, John 'Immigrant' 3, Lawrence Rector of Little Braxted ((Rev.)) 2, Lawrence Gent. 1) was born 16 Nov 1734 in Pope's Creek, Westmoreland Co., VA 15 and died about 1781 of Stafford Co., Virginia 15 about age 47. Samuel married Ann STEPTOE 15 about 1765.15 Ann was born about 1737 15 and died about 1777 of Stafford Co., Virginia 15 about age 40.

The Child from this marriage was:

17. i. Lawrence Augustine WASHINGTON 18 was born 11 Apr 1774 in Harewood, Jefferson Co., WV 18 and died 15 Feb 1824 18 at age 49. Lawrence married Dorcas WOOD 18 6 Nov 1797 in Winchester, Virginia.18 Dorcas was born circa 1775.
